title: january 3: an apple a day...
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Apple Computer’s original incorporation, and the history of the epically successful company. Turning to music, she talks about the second class of the rock and roll hall of fame. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
